title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 52.3 - Requirements for installation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 52.3 - Requirements for installation

State Regulations

Installation of vehicular traffic hazard warning devices
shall be made in accordance with the manufacturer's specifications and
directions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
52.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
